alert.note: Alert for Petroleum (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Phillips, northeastern Petroleum and southwestern Garfield Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 344 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles southwest of Crooked Creek Rec Area to 6 miles southwest of Mosby. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sand Springs, Mosby, Devils Creek Rec Area, Crooked Creek Rec Area, U L Bend Rec Area and Cat Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
